skills.name: supabase-cli-expert
skills.description: Expert guidance for Supabase CLI operations including database connections, migrations, RLS policies, Edge Functions, and troubleshooting.
skills.author: nibbletech-labs

skills.name: superskills-browser
skills.description: Browse and discover plugins available in the SuperSkills marketplace. Use when the user asks about available plugins, wants to find specific tools, or needs installation guidance. Works with zero configuration.
skills.author: nibbletech-labs

skills.name: superskills-updater
skills.description: Check for and install updates to SuperSkills bundles. Use when the user asks about updates, wants to see what's new, or needs to upgrade their bundle. Compares local plugin.json version against remote marketplace.json.
skills.author: nibbletech-labs
